description: Updates an existing Amazon Q App, allowing modifications to its title, description, and definition.

parameters.name: instanceId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon Q Business application environment instance.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Q App to update.

parameters.name: appDefinition
parameters.description: The new definition specifying the cards and flow for the Q App. The cards that make up the Q App definition. (dict) --- The properties defining an input card in an Amazon Q App. textInput (dict) --- A container for the properties of the text input card. The title or label of the text input card. The unique identifier of the text input card. The type of the card. placeholder (string) --- The placeholder text to display in the text input field. defaultValue (string) --- The default value to pre-populate in the text input field. qQuery (dict) --- A container for the properties of the query input card. The title or label of the query card. The unique identifier of the query card. The prompt or instructions displayed for the query card. outputSource (string) --- The source or type of output to generate for the query card. attributeFilter (dict) --- Turns on filtering of responses based on document attributes or metadata fields. andAllFilters (list) --- Performs a logical AND operation on all supplied filters. (dict) --- The filter criteria used on responses based on document attributes or metadata fields. orAllFilters (list) --- Performs a logical OR operation on all supplied filters. notFilter (dict) --- Performs a logical NOT operation on all supplied filters. equalsTo (dict) --- Performs an equals operation on two document attributes or metadata fields. Supported for the following document attribute value types: dateValue, longValue, stringListValue and stringValue. The identifier for the attribute. The value of the attribute. stringValue (string) --- A string. stringListValue (list) --- A list of strings. (string) --- longValue (integer) --- A long integer value. dateValue (datetime) --- A date expressed as an ISO 8601 string. It's important for the time zone to be included in the ISO 8601 date-time format. For example, 2012-03-25T12:30:10+01:00 is the ISO 8601 date-time format for March 25th 2012 at 12:30PM (plus 10 seconds) in Central European Time. containsAll (dict) --- Returns true when a document contains all the specified document attributes or metadata fields. Supported for the following document attribute value types: stringListValue. containsAny (dict) --- Returns true when a document contains any of the specified document attributes or metadata fields. greaterThan (dict) --- Performs a greater than operation on two document attributes or metadata fields. Supported for the following document attribute value types: dateValue and longValue. greaterThanOrEquals (dict) --- Performs a greater than or equals operation on two document attributes or metadata fields. lessThan (dict) --- Performs a less than operation on two document attributes or metadata fields. lessThanOrEquals (dict) --- Performs a less than or equals operation on two document attributes or metadata fields.Supported for the following document attribute value type: dateValue and longValue. qPlugin (dict) --- A container for the properties of the plugin input card. The title or label of the plugin card. The unique identifier of the plugin card. The prompt or instructions displayed for the plugin card. The unique identifier of the plugin used by the card. actionIdentifier (string) --- The action identifier of the action to be performed by the plugin card. fileUpload (dict) --- A container for the properties of the file upload input card. The title or label of the file upload card. The unique identifier of the file upload card. filename (string) --- The default filename to use for the file upload card. fileId (string) --- The identifier of a pre-uploaded file associated with the card. allowOverride (boolean) --- A flag indicating if the user can override the default file for the upload card. formInput (dict) --- A container for the properties of the form input card. The title or label of the form input card. The unique identifier of the form input card. The metadata that defines the form input card data. The JSON schema that defines the shape of the response data. computeMode (string) --- The compute mode of the form input card. This property determines whether individual participants of a data collection session can submit multiple response or one response. A compute mode of append shall allow participants to submit the same form multiple times with different values. A compute mode of ``replace``code> shall overwrite the current value for each participant. initialPrompt (string) --- The initial prompt displayed when the Q App is started.

nested_params.name: computeMode
nested_params.description: The compute mode of the form input card. This property determines whether individual participants of a data collection session can submit multiple response or one response. A compute mode of append shall allow participants to submit the same form multiple times with different values. A compute mode of ``replace``code> shall overwrite the current value for each participant.

nested_params.name: initialPrompt
nested_params.description: The initial prompt displayed when the Q App is started.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the updated Q App.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the updated Q App.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The new title of the updated Q App.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The new description of the updated Q App.

nested_items.name: initialPrompt
nested_items.description: The initial prompt for the updated Q App.

nested_items.name: appVersion
nested_items.description: The new version of the updated Q App.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the updated Q App.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the Q App was originally created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who originally created the Q App.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the Q App was last updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last updated the Q App.

nested_items.name: requiredCapabilities
nested_items.description: The capabilities required for the updated Q App.
